html.element: Create a new scenario and a completely new Actor.
1. Close all open scenarios and create a new scenario:
• Go to the Scenario menu and choose New Java Scenario...
1. Open the World and change the name of the world to something that describes your game:

1. Compile your new world to check that it works
  2. Create a new Actor without an image

• Right click on the Actor box and select New Subclass...
  • Select the Image Category that most closely describes the sort of Actor you are making (is it an animal, some transport, etc)
  • Select Unspecified as the Library image
  • Give it a name (e.g. Spaceman)
  • Click OK.

• Find the line: super(600, 400, 1);
  • Beneath this line, add the instruction to add your new actor to the world. As the world is 600 wide and 400 high, if we add the new actor at 300, 200 then it should be in the middle of the screen.
As it has no image, it will be a green foot.
To give your actor a set of costumes - see the How To Guide on changing an actor's image.
